sys_ui_macro.name: tab_matrix
sys_ui_macro.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
<script>
	<!--This matrix contains the valid tabs for the configuration we can create.-->
	
	var tabMatrix = {
		sections: [0, 1]
	};
	tabMatrix.getTabs = function() {
		var tabs = this.sections;
		return tabs.filter(function(value, index, self) {
			return self.indexOf(value) === index;
		});
	};
	tabMatrix.getNext = function(current) {
		var tabs = this.sections;
		for(var i = 0; i != tabs.length; i++) {
			var next = tabs[current + i];
			if(undefined == next) 
				return tabs[current];
			
			if(next != current)
				return next;
		}
	};
	tabMatrix.getPrev = function(current) {
		var tabs = this.sections;
		for(var i = 0; i != tabs.length; i++) {
			var next = tabs[current - i];
			if(undefined == next) 
				return tabs[current];
			
			if(next != current)
				return next;
		}
	};
	tabMatrix.isFirst = function(current) {
		var tabs = this.sections;
		return current == tabs[0];
	};
	
	tabMatrix.isLast = function(current) {
		var tabs = this.sections;
		return (current == tabs[tabs.length - 1]);
	};
	tabMatrix.last = function() {
		var tabs = this.sections;
		return tabs[tabs.length - 1];
	};
</script>
</j:jelly>
